Text: This procedure is used in the Conditions_2.csv file of this experiment. To see the second set of conditions, add "?c" to the login url. For example, if this was "cogfog.com/TK/demo/", use the url "cogfog.com/TK/demo/?c". This can be used to set up a testing or demo condition, without affecting the conditions found in the original conditions file. Or, if you want to run both older adults and younger adults online at the same time, you can send one group to the original url, and th otehrs to this alternative url. The data will show up in the same place, the other difference is what conditions were available to each group.
